GET.name: GET /
GET.description: This route is handled by React Router and currently displays the card viewer page

GET.name: GET /docs
GET.description: This route is handled by React Router and displays this page!

GET.name: GET /api/cards
GET.description: This endpoint accepts query parameters to filter cards by any of their properties

GET.description: Returns a list of the file names of the card images
